ghostPost.title: v1.5.2
ghostPost.html:
There was a bug with Twitter integration which treated Twitter DMs and tweets as a single conversation. This led to unintentional tweets which were assumed to be sent as DMs.

This release fixes this issue.
ghostPost.excerpt:
There was a bug with Twitter integration which treated Twitter DMs and tweets as
a single conversation. This led to unintentional tweets which were assumed to be
sent as DMs.

This release fixes this issue.
